name: Disco Republic - Power Out
description:
Welcome to Power Out. Your aim is to collect key's, kill enemies and finally reach the sign at the end of each level.

Power out is a first person horror game that is aimed towards players that are visually impaired. The game itself contains a menu, tutorial and 2 levels.

This game itself is still in development however and the aim is to have it completed by October 2021.

Team Members:

Keegan Browne - Project Lead

Matthew Hargitay - Sound Design

Nathan Pygall - Programming

Matthew Crooke - Level Design

Matthew Hughes - 3D Modelling

Jack Weald - 3D Modelling

Jacob Wesley - AI movement
